name: Ball Rush
description:
Ball Rush Is A Fast Paced Indie Platformer Game. Free To Play And Very Addictive Gameplay.

Includes:

1)15 Fun And Challenging Levels.

2) Increasing Difficulty.

3) Many Different Obstacles.

4) Made With Buildbox Game Creation Software.

5) Simple One Click Control.

6) Easy To Learn Hard To Play Gameplay

7) Checkpoint After Every Level To Save Progress.

How To Play ;

Click To JUMP Hold To FLY And Anything Black Is Your Enemy.

...........................................................................................................

THIS GAME IS FREE FOR NOW (FULL VERSION) , SOON IT WILL BE PAID .

SO GRAB IT BEFORE IT BECOMES A PAID GAME.
